verses.verse: Bless<WH1288> Yahweh,<WH3068> my soul.<WH5315> Yahweh,<WH3068> my God,<WH430> you are very<WH3966> great.<WH1431> You are clothed<WH3847> with honor<WH1935> and majesty.<WH1926>
He covers<WH5844> himself with light<WH216> as with a garment.<WH8008> He stretches out<WH5186> the heavens<WH8064> like a curtain.<WH3407>
He lays the beams<WH7136> of his rooms<WH5944> in the waters.<WH4325> He makes<WH7760> the clouds<WH5645> his chariot.<WH7398> He walks<WH1980> on the wings<WH3671> of the wind.<WH7307>
He makes<WH6213> his messengers<WH4397> winds;<WH7307> his servants<WH8334> flames<WH3857> of fire.<WH784>
He laid<WH3245> the foundations<WH4349> of the earth,<WH776> that it should not be moved<WH4131> forever.<WH5769>
You covered<WH3680> it with the deep<WH8415> as with a cloak.<WH3830> The waters<WH4325> stood<WH5975> above the mountains.<WH2022>
At<WH4480> your rebuke<WH1606> they fled.<WH5127> At the voice<WH6963> of your thunder<WH7482> they hurried away.<WH2648>
The mountains<WH2022> rose,<WH5927> the valleys<WH1237> sank down,<WH3381> to the place<WH4725> which<WH2088> you had assigned to them.<WH3245>
You have set<WH7760> a boundary<WH1366> that they may not pass over;<WH5674> that they don't<WH7725> turn again to cover<WH3680> the earth.<WH776>
He sends<WH7971> forth springs<WH4599> into the valleys.<WH5158> They run<WH1980> among the mountains.<WH2022>
They give drink<WH8248> to every animal<WH2416> of the field.<WH7704> The wild donkeys<WH6501> quench<WH7665> their thirst.<WH6772>
The birds<WH5775> of the sky<WH8064> nest<WH7931> by them.<WH5414> They sing among<WH996> the branches.<WH6073>
He waters<WH8248> the mountains<WH2022> from his rooms.<WH5944> The earth<WH776> is filled<WH7646> with the fruit<WH6529> of your works.<WH4639>
He causes the grass<WH2682> to grow<WH6779> for the livestock,<WH929> and plants<WH6212> for man<WH120> to cultivate,<WH3318> that he may bring forth food<WH3899> out<WH3318> of the earth:<WH776>
wine<WH3196> that makes glad<WH8055> the heart<WH3824> of man,<WH582> oil<WH8081> to make his face<WH6440> to shine,<WH6670> and bread<WH3899> that strengthens<WH5582> man<WH582>'s heart.<WH3824>
Yahweh<WH3068>'s trees<WH6086> are well watered,<WH7646> the cedars<WH730> of Lebanon,<WH3844> which he has planted;<WH5193>
where the birds<WH6833> make their nests.<WH7077> The stork<WH2624> makes its home<WH1004> in the fir trees.<WH1265>
The high<WH1364> mountains<WH2022> are for the wild goats.<WH3277> The rocks<WH5553> are a refuge<WH4268> for the rock badgers.<WH8227>
He appointed<WH6213> the moon<WH3394> for seasons.<WH4150> The sun<WH8121> knows<WH3045> when to set.<WH3996>
You make<WH7896> darkness,<WH2822> and it is night,<WH3915> in which all the animals<WH2416> of the forest<WH3293> prowl.<WH7430>
The young lions<WH3715> roar<WH7580> after their prey,<WH2964> and seek<WH1245> their food<WH400> from God.<WH410>
The sun<WH8121> rises,<WH2224> and they steal away,<WH622> and lay down<WH7257> in their dens.<WH4585>
Man<WH120> goes forth<WH3318> to his work,<WH6467> to his labor<WH5656> until the evening.<WH6153>
Yahweh,<WH3068> how many<WH7231> are your works!<WH4639> In wisdom<WH2451> have you made<WH6213> them all.<WH776> The earth is full<WH4390> of your riches.<WH7075>
There is the sea,<WH3220> great<WH1419> and wide,<WH7342> in which are innumerable<WH4557> living<WH7431> things,<WH6996> both small and large<WH1419> animals.<WH2416>
There the ships<WH591> go,<WH1980> and leviathan,<WH3882> whom you formed<WH3335> to play there.<WH7832>
These all wait<WH7663> for you,<WH5414> that you may give them their food<WH400> in due season.<WH6256>
You give<WH5414> to them;<WH3950> they gather. You open<WH6605> your hand;<WH3027> they are satisfied<WH7646> with good.<WH2896>
You hide<WH5641> your face:<WH6440> they are troubled;<WH926> you take away<WH622> their breath:<WH7307> they die,<WH1478> and return<WH7725> to the dust.<WH6083>
You send<WH7971> forth your Spirit:<WH7307> they are created.<WH1254> You renew<WH2318> the face<WH6440> of the ground.<WH127>
Let the glory<WH3519> of Yahweh<WH3068> endure forever.<WH5769> Let Yahweh<WH3068> rejoice<WH8055> in his works.<WH4639>
He looks<WH5027> at the earth,<WH776> and it trembles.<WH7460> He touches<WH5060> the mountains,<WH2022> and they smoke.<WH6225>
I will sing<WH7891> to Yahweh<WH3068> as long as I live.<WH2416> I will sing<WH2167> praise to my God<WH430> while I have any being.<WH5750>
Let your meditation<WH7879> be sweet<WH6149> to him.<WH8055> I will rejoice in Yahweh.<WH3068>
Let sinners<WH2400> be consumed<WH8552> out of the earth.<WH776> Let the wicked<WH7563> be no more.<WH1288> Bless Yahweh,<WH3068> my soul.<WH5315> Praise<WH1984> Yah!<WH3068>
